Package com.example.recipeoop_1.security

package com.example.recipeoop_1.security
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.recipeoop_1
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
    Custom implementation of AuthenticationEntryPoint for handling JWT authentication failures.
    JwtRequestFilter
    A Spring Security filter that intercepts incoming HTTP requests to validate JWT tokens.
    JwtTokenUtil
    Utility class for performing JWT (JSON Web Token) operations.
    JwtUserDetailsService
    Service implementation for UserDetailsService to load user-specific data.
    JwtUserDetailsService.UserInfo
    Inner static class to hold user information (username, password, roles) for the in-memory user store.
    WebSecurityConfig
    Spring Security configuration class for the application.
